Ingredients.name: Globby Fat
Ingredients.description:
Thick fat from a monster. Delicious, though it takes some
getting used to the taste.

Ingredients.name: Hearty Powder
Ingredients.description:
Delicate powder that stimulates the tastebuds. Used as a
spice and as a thickener in cooking.

Ingredients.name: Flaky Potato
Ingredients.description:
A fresh potato that's a little on the small side. Tends to
maintain its shape, making it ideal for boiling.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Egg
Ingredients.description:
A freshly laid egg. The yellow yolk inside is highly
nutritious.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Milk
Ingredients.description:
Freshly drawn milk. Soft and pleasant on the tongue with a
hint of sweetness.

Ingredients.name: Mature Cheese
Ingredients.description:
Matured cheese with a deep flavor. Delicious both on its own
and when used for cooking.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Herb
Ingredients.description:
A herb with a refreshing fragrance. Used for a variety of
purposes, from removing odors from meats to making herb tea.

Ingredients.name: Crisp Onion
Ingredients.description:
A large onion with a crisp texture. Not all that pungent, so
it can be eaten as it is.

Ingredients.name: Clear Gelatin
Ingredients.description:
A wobbly, viscous liquid. Its appearance may leave much to be
desired, but it melts in the mouth.

Ingredients.name: Chitinous Shell
Ingredients.description:
A highly nutritious monster's shell. Produces a mellow
tasting stock when boiled.

Ingredients.name: White Beast Flesh
Ingredients.description:
White meat from a monster. Has a tender texture and
refreshing taste.

Ingredients.name: Red Beast Flesh
Ingredients.description:
Red meat from a monster. Fills you with energy with every
bite.

Ingredients.name: Healthy Liquor
Ingredients.description:
A liquor with a mild taste. Highly nutritious, it is
particularly prized in cooking.

Ingredients.name: Assorted Grains
Ingredients.description:
An assortment of popular grains, including rice, wheat and
beans. Essential for cooking.

Ingredients.name: Coarse Rock Salt
Ingredients.description: Coarsely ground rock salt. Exceptionally salty on the tongue.

Ingredients.name: Honey Syrup
Ingredients.description:
Fragrant honey syrup. Known for being sweet without being too
rich.

Ingredients.name: Acerbic Tomato
Ingredients.description:
A new kind of tomato native to the Liberl Kingdom.
Incredibly bitter, and yet strangely addictive.

Ingredients.name: Starberry
Ingredients.description:
A small fruit with a star-like shape when cut open. Known for
its sweet and sour taste.
